document.full_text: at least 30 people were killed in yemen after military jets pounded a southern town held by al qaeda and troops opened fire on demonstrators demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's nearly 33-year rule.
document.title: yemeni jets bomb al qaeda-held city
lines_and_colors: at least 30 people were killed in yemen after military jets pounded a southern town held by al qaeda and troops opened fire on demonstrators demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's nearly 33-year rule.
